p: Understanding of the genetic diversity and population structure is very much essential to plan any conservation or genetic improvement program for any species. A total of ten best ISSR primers (S 1 Table) that showed reproducible polymorphic amplification during screening step were used to analyse 545 individual genotypes of H. cordata Thunb. covering 18 populations, resulted in 137 markers. The number of bands amplified ranged from 28 to 47 with an average of 40.7 bands per population. The band pattern across these 18 populations is given in supplementary information 2 and Fig.Â 2.
